title: Rhubarb cheesecake
ingredients: ['For the base', '125g (4¼ oz) plain flour', '4 tablespoons caster sugar', '125g (4¼ oz) butter', 'For the filling', '375g (13 oz) chopped rhubarb', '100g (3¾ oz) caster sugar', '1 tablespoon plain flour', '500g (1¼ lb) cream cheese', '100g (3¾ oz) caster sugar', '2 eggs', 'For the topping', '225ml (8 fl oz) soured cream', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
